ConvertVerbDescription.message: Convert documents to or from PDF.

extensionMenuTitle.message: Acrobat Extension - Shortcut to all your PDF tools

fteOwnershipSideRedCardContent.message: Comment, fill forms, sign, and more right in Chrome when you set Acrobat as your default PDF viewer.

localFileOptionDesc.message: Grant Acrobat extension access to your local file URLs to open all your PDFs in Acrobat in Chrome.

localFteDescription.message: Get the most out of the Acrobat extension and use it to open all PDFs. Turn on Allow access to file URLs in the extension settings.

localFteTitle.message: Switch to Acrobat to open your local files

pdfOwnershipExploreOptionsDescription.message: Make Acrobat the default PDF viewer in your browser to use commenting, fill and sign, and more PDF tools.

pdfOwnershipPromptContent.message: Do more with PDFs in Chrome when you set Adobe Acrobat as your default viewer.

pdfOwnershipPromptContent2.message: Set Acrobat as your default PDF viewer to use PDFs right in Google Chrome. Comment, fill, sign, and try tools like convert and compress.

pdfOwnershipPromptContentEdge.message: Do more with PDFs in Microsoft Edge when you set Adobe Acrobat as your default viewer.
